intent_atoms.description: Kick off C2 – Tree view rendering using the new ParseTreeStore snapshots (outline UI, search, filters).
Draft C3 detail/hex stores that subscribe to the Combine bridge for payload slices and metadata panels.

functional_units.name: Tree View Rendering
functional_units.description: Render a tree view UI using ParseTreeStore snapshots, including outline display, search functionality, and filters.

functional_units.name: Detail/Hex Stores Subscription
functional_units.description: Create detail and hex data stores that subscribe to the Combine bridge for payload slices and provide metadata panels.
